descriptionHtml:
UPDATED 1/30: Added optional Roof Only version which replaces the 2 Riften roof textures and 1 LOD file.

This mod adds the same saturation, brightness, and contrast adjustments to Riften as were made in my [url=http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6842]Vivid Whiterun[/url] mod.

It is a fairly simple mod and it\'s not for everyone. All I\'ve done is increase the saturation and adjust the brightness/contrast on all the Riften textures. I also changed the roof shingle color to orange for more visual appeal. You can tell by the images it does make quite a noticeable difference, however some of the interior textures may appear too bright or washed out. Try it out and see if you like it.

Adds/Replaces all 29 textures under
/skyrim/data/textures/architecture/riften

and the 3 riften LOD textures under
/skyrim/data/textures/lod

To uninstall remove the above folders.

Notes: Even with the LOD texture adjustments, the roof color still appears to pop when you get within a certain distance (outside of town). I haven\'t figured out a solution for this yet.
author: Poliorketika
